# Read the Docs platform documentation

> https://docs.readthedocs.com/platform/stable/

Read the Docs hosts documentation for your team with reliable builds, versioning, and integrations.

## Documentation Structure

- Getting started: /platform/stable/tutorial/
- Guides: /platform/stable/guides/
- Reference: /platform/stable/reference/
- API: /platform/stable/api/

## Key Features

- Versioned documentation builds
- Team access controls
- Custom domains and branding
- Search and analytics
- Integrations with Git providers

## Metadata files

- robots.txt: /robots.txt
- sitemap.xml: /sitemap.xml
- llms.txt: /llms.txt

## This llms.txt File

This file helps AI assistants understand the structure and content of the Read the Docs platform documentation.

For more information about llms.txt support on Read the Docs, see: /platform/stable/reference/llms-txt/
